content: winsome blue scarf materials yarn sport weight yarn about 7 oz i used a boucle but will work up well with just about anything hook size g hook abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet dtr = treble_crochet cluster = cluster stitch p = picot lp = loop st = stitch skip = skip decrease = together space = space round = round yo = wrap yarn over hook decrease = decrease increase increase mc = main color slip_stitch = slip_stitch cc = contrasting color repeat = repeat * repeat from as indicated = repeat between as indicated row 1 chain 38 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook 1 double_crochet in next 3 chain skip 2 chain double_crochet in next chain chain 2 double_crochet in same st skip 2 chain double_crochet in next chain chain 2 double_crochet in same st 7 times skip 2 chain 1 double_crochet in the next 4 chain sts chain 3 turn 8 v sts row 2 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in each chain 2 space across double_crochet in each of the next 3 double_crochet double_crochet in top of chain 3 chain 3 turn r0w 3 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in same double_crochet skip 4 double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in same double_crochet 7 times skip 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in the next 4 chain sts double_crochet in top of chain 3 chain 3 turn repeat row 2 and 3 till desired length loopy fringe * chain 20 single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * across end off weave end in repeat on the other end of scarf a kathryn a white original 2005 www crochetnbeads com all patterns may be duplicated for private use but not for resale
